content.label: For the most part, this is an enjoyable time consuming app! But tonight I was very dismayed to find out that the word FART is not a valid word! You have been warned!!! You will not be able to play this word on the app. Very disheartening!!!

I cannot stand this new Scrabble go app, please consider the original simple layout for those of us that just want to play Scrabble, and that's it. That said I absolutely Love the game of Scrabble, just not this "Scrabble Go" version.

Can’t pass and play with a friend sitting together.
I’d like to play with more then one opponent at a time. Why can’t we play 3 or 4 in a game like the old scrabble app. And how do we check a word using the dictionary.

Ok, so as a Scrabble addict I was willing to switch to this app when the quite good original one was taken away. I was willing to endure the mind-numbing, overly repetitive ads that interrupted the flow of the games. But apparently their only objective is making money, because now the number of ads has been increased so that they pop in after every move or two. How many hours does one waste sitting through the same commercial stupidity over and over and over again? That is too much pain to put up with, so I deleted the app today. Congratulations, oafs, for spoiling a great game.

An ad after every turn when you are playing 60 games is ridiculous. I can’t ever get through them all. After EACH play. Will not pay $8.00 a month just to get rid of ads so just deleted this game. If you have tons of time and patience you might put up with this. It is a big NO for me.

I love this game!  But what has happened playing Zoey (I guess the computer)?  When it is her turn it freezes and will will not play!  Please fix!  Can give only a one star for now.  Fix and I will give a five.

There are so many ads and useless stuff on app that it freezes up at least once a day 
And back button is so far to left it is hard to access and rarely can you get to home page. 
And scammers on here are really annoying

title.label: They restrict app switching and exiting

content.label: Using an iPhone 11 and they restrict your access to swipe up to switch apps or exiting/closing the app. Fishy.
Ads after every single play, too much extra stuff going on. Just wanted an app to play scrabble. Deleted it today because of too many ads
An additional plays EVERY turn. Hi am considering deleting the app.
I love it
I love this game as me but all of a sudden ads after everything I do.  This made me stop playing.
Fix the store not opening up and the game asking me to connect to Facebook when it's already connected. Game was fine until the shop tab started buffering for over two days now.

I play this app because my parents do. It’s fun as a game, it’s scrabble but the current setup has a 30 second ad after EVERY move. Every one. It’s annoying. I wouldn’t use this app except my family seems to like it. The only way to avoid this annoyance, is to pay them a monthly fee. Like a subscription. It’s ridiculous. You’re way better off with one of their competitors like Words with Friends.

As any earlier reviewer said, this does not replace the classic and totally satisfying game that was pulled from the market. It’s not only filled with ridiculous animations and silly prizes and rewards, it apparently is full of toxic men hitting on women players. If you accept a game from a man, close the comment section or be prepared for “Hi prety ladi, were you live” Even those who can spell are enormously creepy. Plus this game freezes as often as the old one. Right now I have about 10 prizes in my in box that will not open. Although I have arena tickets, the game still wants 12 gems as admission. Come on developers what the actual heck?

title.label: If You Love Ads & Valid Words not Accepted

content.label: If You Love Ads & Valid Words not Accepted, then download this app. An ad after every play or every other play is way too much! The game’s dictionary needs updated as it doesn’t accept valid words found in other scrabble dictionaries! I deleted it due to spending as much time sitting through ads as playing

I have loved the actual Scrabble app, but now it’s being discontinued for unexplained reasons. Now they’ve substituted nonsense.,This Scrabble Go app is awful. Made for kids? Annoying, distracting, and full of needless bells and whistles. Ugh. Deleted the app immediately.
I am addicted to Scrabble Go. But this afternoon it froze up on me. It has frozen for 2-3 hours. Please HELP!!!
Horrible crapola - not the game of Scrabble but more like the worst of Las Vegas.

I have had the same issue with this game multiple times and the support refuses to answer my contact messages so I will just post it on the review. I spent time playing the puzzle path only for me to go to my inbox to open rewards and they disappear. This constantly happens or the rewards are stuck and you can’t open them. A total waste of time. So forget the rewards, you will never receive them so don’t try to even make your way through any of the challenges to get one. They will not answer your contact messages either.

title.label: What took me so long to join??

content.label: Soooo much fun! Total distraction from the ugly world we live in!  Entertaining and addicting in a good way! Always learning new words too!
It would be nice to just have the electronic version of scrabble back instead of this animated useless app. I just want to play the person sitting next to me not some person on the internet.
Absolutely right about the men on scrabble...if we are out playing with them, they will go away!

Hello Scrabble Go  Rep,
  I Enjoy Is our New Scrabble Go
Game This is My 1st Time
  Playing The New Game
And I Really Enjoy It!
   I Rate it 5 Stars Thank You
I  am a  New Player!

Oh my gosh, the ads are driving me insane and they’re only increasing!  I will never EVER be convinced to download a game with an annoying clamor of a soundtrack just because they have broken my Scrabble concentration with it for the gazillionth time.  It’s just way too much to expect a person to tolerate for the brief snippets of time it takes to play one’s Scrabble turn.
I like the game but all the ads are ridiculous obviously they want you to pay a fee so you can play ad free ~ they need to come up with a way to deal with this

title.label: Good app, but doesn’t have what I’m looking for.

content.label: The program is good, and I like being able to see whether my word is valid before I actually play. However, I would like an option for one-player Scrabble (where one player gets all 100 tiles) or at the very least pass-and-play rather than having to play single-player games against the computer.
I just want to play without having all the interruptions.
It started off good then the ads started.

Once you blocked people from sending you messages (lots of scams), the game was great. However, now you get ads after every move. Took all the enjoyment out of playing. I play 40 games, so to play all games it takes forever now. It used to be an ad after 5 moves. Doubt I’ll be playing much longer.

title.label: Foreign men continually trying to scam

content.label:
I love the scrabble and enjoy the few normal chats I have had. But I did the math—actually counting the number of men trying to pull something on me. Their advances seem to be subtly sexual. When I tel them I am happily married, they still don’t give up. Continually wanting me to give them my email address or to go to Google chatting or some other site. The only way to enjoy straight scrabble go is to turn off the chat. 

Out of 66 games I am currently playing only 18% are other females. The other 82% are males. Of those males—90% try to come on to me or scan—I don’t let them get far. If I am not interested in their advances they resign from the game. I report them but nothing happens.
The game keeps glitching out and cannot be played smoothly. I miss playing it but can’t download it as it will again start glitching and I will lose all my crystals and points. Please fix it soon!
SO GOOD! DOWNLOAD THE BEST APP FOR FREE TODAY!

I’ve been playing this game for months. When I get challenged from men, it turns into an issue. They all are divorced, widowed, over seas and/or lonely. If I ignore the chat, they quit. If I repo d and tell them I’m just here to play, they get pushy and/or resign the game. HUGE waste of time. I’ve contacted customer service to give some suggestions on how to fix this. They do not care. 
Beware if you’re just looking to play.  Too many men using it as a dating site.

I miss the old Scrabble app before it was bought by Scopely. This company has no genuine interest or respect for the original game of Scrabble! Scopely just cares about making money. Shame on you! The amount of ads you put is mind-numbing. It is indecent!

It would have been better to keep the traditional Scrabble alongside this new version and let people choose.

After about a year of this unmitigated disaster, which is quite obvious with the low number of players, that is dwindling by the day, isn’t it time to bring back the traditional scrabble? Or maybe the creators of this new childish and uninspiring version, do not want to admit its utter failure?

You had a perfectly good scrabble app, and you ruined it by trying to find ways to make players pay more to play. And it’s cheap looking and unstable. Looks like I’ll be foregoing network games and using the old app for pass and play games on my iPad.

title.label: As for the game, it’s full of bugs!

content.label: Spell out a common word and it’s “not in the dictionary.”  Or spell a word out horizontally, only to be told that words have to be spelled in straight lines.  Crap!

I like the game. What I don’t like is having to watch my wallet in the process. 90% of the people that engage you in conversations are men, who have a sob story. Best thing I have done is come up with my own...because then they don’t know how to act. Equally, I’ve had to change my “image” using a Snapchat filter. When they think you are a man they immediately resign the game. So be smart ladies, these men aren’t interested in you, just your wallet.

If the scammers weren’t bad enough, the advertisements are insane. When I started playing the game wasn’t all ads, now every time I play a word, I get a pop up ad. Seriously need to cut back on the ads. And due to the ads at every turn, I have deleted the game.

Get rid of all the stupid ads, stop with limited dictionaries and deal with the scammers and I may come back.

Ok, I get that “free” games need to run ads to make revenue.  I get it.  But this game has adds run between every single match, sometimes multiples. 

Also, I won the right to the “Entertainer” tile weeks back thru in-game requirements, but have yet to receive it, which is absolutely uncool.

The old scrabble game I had upgraded to no ads.  Then I had to switch.  Now there is an ad after EVERY game.  Stupid, irritating, ads. Plus I cannot play new people because most of them send weird messages.  I also don’t need 10 different types of games. I just want to play scrabble and preferably without a ton of ads.  Do not like this.
The interface is a cluttered mess. I cannot find the last game I made a move in. I don't have Facebook and am pestered to log in with Facebook.
I stopped counting at a dozen crashes. Uninstalling.

The app is slow, has too many ads, too many animations and overall is so I enjoyable I’m just not going to play it. 

Necessary Changes: Create a true classic mode w/ no animations, faster computer response, no ads.  Just scrabble.  Like it was before.  I can’t believe y’all have created such a terrible app of a very simple and fun game.
I have multiple games going, and an ad pops up after EVERY play! This is so annoying. I know I get ads because I have the free version, but every play? Really??!!

title.label: Ads are insane the higher your level

content.label:
I began playing this game in March, and I’d have an ad maybe every 10-12 games. As I progressed in levels, ads starting coming sooner, and lasting longer. 

I am now level 90 with more than 40 active games, and I get an ad every 1-2 games now, which last anywhere from 5-30 seconds, and the CALM ad lasting nearly two minutes. 

Sure, I could close out, and restart, but that only ensures more ads. 

You shouldn’t do this to high level players. They’ve should have fewer ads now than when they started. 

I could *potentially* avoid them by paying a monthly fee? Thanks, but no. 

Too bad, because I really enjoyed the game, and the players I was actively engaged with.
For some reason this app constantly crashes. I can’t play anything except against someone. Because if I do the other part, it closes out.

I love this game & gameplay. 
The only thing & this is just me being picky. Can you make it so I can rotate my phone and the board adjust accordingly. 

Please :) 
I know .....
The app works great on the iPhone but constantly crashes on the iPad Air.

After 100’s of hours of playing scrabble with my best friend EA dumped us!  I plead that someone will replace it.  This kiddy game is not even close to what we have enjoyed competitively for years.  We are not happy with Word Master or Word with Friends or any one of a bunch of other glitz kiddy games, surely someone out there is smart enough to give us back a true scrabble game that two people setting across the room from each other can play, laugh together and discover what better word we missed!
